definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: If an engine ticks over slowly or too fast an adjustment must be made to the carburettor .
sentences.chinese: 如果發動機空轉得太慢或太快，應該調整汽化器。

sentences.english: The combustor is of the vaporiser type, and hence is equipped with three preheat burners.
sentences.chinese: 燃燒室是汽化器的類型，因此是有三個預熱刻錄機。

sentences.english: Vaporizers convert the liquid oxygen into a gaseous state.
sentences.chinese: 汽化器把液氧轉化成氣態。

sentences.english: Objective:To evaluate the clinical effect of transurethral electrovaparization in treatment of bladder tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討經尿道電汽化治療膀胱腫瘤的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Vaporizers convert the liquid nitrogen to its gaseous state.
sentences.chinese: 汽化器把液氮轉化成氣態。

sentences.english: A carburetor modification kit to achieve conversion to the "flow-through" principle that allows large volume sample fuel flow.
sentences.chinese: 一個汽化器改良組件，使得大量樣品燃料能“流過”。

sentences.english: And he is going to close the gas canister and give me my keys back.
sentences.chinese: 他現在把汽化爐關上了，把鑰匙還給了我。

sentences.english: Objective To find out the changes of blood glucose in the surgery of transurethral prostatic vaporized electrocision.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解經尿道前列腺汽化電切術中血糖變化。

sentences.english: The atomization process is more sensitive to disturbance than vaporization.
sentences.chinese: 霧化過程比汽化過程對擾動更爲敏感。

sentences.english: Nung-fu went to the equipment store, bought the repair kit to fix the carburetor of the tractor.
sentences.chinese: 農夫去修護店購買耕耘機汽化器修理零件組合。

sentences.english: Processes that use nitrogen as a liquid do not require the vaporizers and pressure control manifold.
sentences.chinese: 使用液氮的過程不要求有汽化器和壓力控制管。

sentences.english: After that, proceed to Shenzhen by train.
sentences.chinese: 之後安排乘電汽化火車赴往深圳。

sentences.english: And the same thing will happen for the bubble line.
sentences.chinese: 在汽化線上會發生同樣現象。

sentences.english: The thermostat is connected by a link to the carburetor.
sentences.chinese: 恆溫控制器是由一根連桿與汽化器相連的。

sentences.english: Bubbling boiling vaporization device center can provide, to prevent violent boiling liquid.
sentences.chinese: 鼓泡裝置可以提供沸騰的汽化中心，防止液體暴沸。

sentences.english: I am having some trouble with the carburetor .
sentences.chinese: 我的這人汽化器有些毛病。

definition: to vaporize/evaporation/carburetion/氣|气[qi4] transformation in TCM (i.e. transformation of yin yang vital breath)/unvoicing of voiced consonant
